description: Lists the RAM permissions that are associated with a resource share.

parameters.name: resourceShareArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share for which you want to retrieve the associated permissions.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the permissions associated with the resource share.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the permission you want information about.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the permission associated with this resource share.

nested_items.name: defaultVersion
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the version of the managed permission used by this resource share is the default version for this managed permission.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this managed permission.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource to which this permission applies. This takes the form of: service-code: resource-code, and is case-insensitive. For example, an Amazon EC2 Subnet would be represented by the string ec2:subnet.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the permission.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the permission was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the permission was last updated.

nested_items.name: isResourceTypeDefault
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the managed permission associated with this resource share is the default managed permission for all resources of this resource type.

nested_items.name: permissionType
nested_items.description: The type of managed permission. This can be one of the following values:
AWS_MANAGED --- Amazon Web Services created and manages this managed permission. You can associate it with your resource shares, but you can't modify it.
CUSTOMER_MANAGED --- You, or another principal in your account created this managed permission. You can associate it with your resource shares and create new versions that have different permissions.

nested_items.name: featureSet
nested_items.description: Indicates what features are available for this resource share. This parameter can have one of the following values:

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A list of the tag key value pairs currently attached to the permission.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, attached to the tag. Every tag must have a key. Key names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The string value attached to the tag. The value can be an empty string. Key values are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
